channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead baby fox, 5th August
item.description:
Not sure when this happened but appears to have been hit by a car, unsure if that’s the cause of death.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 170, Shooters Hill Road, Blackheath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The same white van, with a tipped back- and the same men fly tipped on the pile there already, 5th August
item.description:
I saw 2 men dumping more industrial waste on top of a pile already reported- now there is at least 70 black bags fly tipped. I didn't see the number plate, but I saw the 2 men. They have dumped waste I thus location 3 times in 3 days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Corinthian Manorway, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 24” hole, 5th August
item.description:
Tree was removed a couple of years ago Have been waiting for a new tree replacement to be planted but nothing to date ?? Seems streets in Bexley etc have this carried out all the time rather than replacing with tarmac Thought trees were being replanted to aid the environment , it would be great to have a new one for the view and look of the road and wildlife seen as it’s next to Danson Park Please respond thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Selwyn Crescent, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Too large and ugly signs, 5th August
item.description:

item.title: Damaged pavements, 5th August
item.description:
Huge chunks of pavement all along have close all needs to be resurfaced We have a care/ disability home at the end an it cause constant problems Myself I have a disabled daughter that has trouble walking along this footpath An many more have a wheelchair an cerpalsy an ms that have problems The wheelchair use the actual road There is any more photos I can take but u only allow 3 to be taken

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Haven Close, North Cray, Sidcup, London

item.title: Comms cabinet front not fixed, 5th August

item.title: Missing Restriction Post, 5th August
item.description:
A concreted wood post originally installed to prevent cars driving over pavement outside property which had been dislodged by previous vans hitting it has been removed within last 2 days and buried in a skip which has been collected within the last few days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holmdale Road, Chislehurst, London

item.title: Fallen fruit, 5th August
item.description:
Outside 14 Westbrooke Rd, the footway is smothered in fallen fruit, making the surface slippery for pedestrians, would there be any chance of having the tree lopped to reduce the amount of fruit Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Westbrooke Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
